sinks.name: Sink1
sinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared inputdata2 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://sqlvaqcn2qpbmvyt22.blob.core.windows.net/triggerdemo/input/data2.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv])
in
  Csv;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = inputdata2,
  #"Sorted rows" = Table.Sort(Source, {{"Column4", Order.Descending}, {"Column1", Order.Ascending}})
in
  #"Sorted rows";
